free: #c 也許他很珍惜，我卻(狠狠地)把水給喝了，因為我很渴。

meta.speaker: None

free: #c Pori給Pani看那隻美麗的鳥。

meta.speaker: None

meta.speaker: None

meta.speaker: None

meta.speaker: None

free: #c Pori砍了Pani的樹。

meta.speaker: None

free: #c Pori砍Pani的樹。

meta.speaker: None

free: #c 媽媽為了Pori唱歌。

free: #c Mu’u把房子給燒了。

meta.speaker: None

meta.speaker: None

free: #c 我看到了Pani丟掉食物。

meta.speaker: None

free: #c 我們大家都聽到Pani罵髒話。

meta.speaker: None

free: #c Pani摔斷他的腿。
#e Pani broke his thigh.

meta.speaker: None

free: #c Na’u自己買一本書。
#e Na’u buys a book herself .

meta.speaker: None

free: #c Pori自己蓋一間房子。

meta.speaker: None

free: #c Pani自己帶兩把刀。
#e Pani carries two knives himself.

meta.speaker: None

free: #c 如果你把水煮到沸騰了, 它可能就已經沒有用了。
#e If you make the water boil, it may turn useless.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 如果你犯錯, 將會有人勸誡你。
#e If you make a mistake, someone will admonish you.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 如果你碰到Pani, 要不要跟他講話?
#e Will you talk to him if you see Pani?

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 如果那個人烤的山豬肉還有的話 我要吃。
#e If there is still the boar meat he roasted left, I want to eat (it).

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 如果你看到巴尼, 給他照張相。
#e If you see Pani, take him a picture.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 要不是Pani鎖了這個門, 不然我們全部(=大家)都可以進去這個房子。
#e Were it not for Pani who locked the door, everybody could go inside the house.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 假如’Avia烤的山豬肉還有剩的話, 我要吃。
#e If there’s still the wild boar that ’avia roasted left, I want to eat (it).

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 現在請掃地, 媽媽等一下就會給(你)錢。
#e Sweep the floor now, and mother will give (you) money later.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 我不怕。
#e I’m not afraid.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 他很膽小。
#e He is timid.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 我很驚訝你很膽小。
#e I was surprised that you are cowardly.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 醫院裡有很多醫生。
#e Many doctors are in the hospital.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 我很難過你生病了。
#e I am sad that you are sick.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 不要調皮，你會受傷。
#e Do not be naughty. You will get hurt.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 山豬肉我已經烤了。
#e I have roasted the wild boar meat.

meta.speaker: None

free: #c 我烤的是山豬肉。
#e what I roasted is the wild boar meat.

meta.speaker: None

free: #c 山豬肉是我烤的。
#e The one who roasted the wild boar meat is me.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 他們吃過我所烤的山豬肉。
#e They ate the wild boar meat I roasted.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 他在吃的山豬肉是我烤的。
#e The wild boar meat he is eating is what I roasted.

meta.speaker: None

free: #c 城市很熱。
#e The city is hot.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 你忘了我回答過你的話。
#e You forgot what I answered you.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 我唱的歌是這首。
#e What I sang is this song.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 那個是我跳過的舞。
#e That is what I danced.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 他所知道的只有這些。
#e What he knows is simply this.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 這房子是媽媽的。
#e This house is the mother ‘s.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 這房子是媽媽買的。
#e The one who bough the house is the mother.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 我經常釣的就像這種魚。
#e what I often fish is like this kind of fish.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 我昨天釣了一隻大魚。
#e I fished a big fish yesterday.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 這條魚是我釣的。
#e As for this fish, I fished (it).

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 他可以/能喝酒。
#e He can drink.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 今晚喝酒的人都醉了。
#e All the people who drank tonight were drunk.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 我在餵食正在喝酒的人的狗。
#e I am feeding the dog of the person who is drinking.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 他是讀書讀很快的人。
#e He is a fast reader.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 在冬天很難買褲子。
#e It’s difficult to buy pants in winter.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 孩子正計劃要去嚇大人。
#e The children are preparing to shock adults.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 達卡努瓦是我忘不了的。
#e Tanganua is what I can’t forget.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 你常常炫耀你射擊很厲害。
#e You often show off that you shots well.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 他半夜上廁所嚇到Pani。
#e At midnight, he goes to the toilet and shocks Pani.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c Pani受傷是因為被Mu’u打。
#e Pani gets hurt because Mu’u hit (him).
#n sii 因為….原因的結果；造成/形成

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 小孩半夜哭吵醒全部落的人。
#e The child cries at midnight and makes all the people in the tribe wake up.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 他想要你去偷Pani家的雞。
#e He is thinking that (he) makes you steal the chicken of Pani’s family.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 我要賺錢來買走Pani昨天買的房子。
#e I will earn money to buy the house Pani bought yesterday.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 我不認為老師說上課吃便當是不禮貌的。
#e I don’t think the teacher says eating meal box during class is impolite.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 在收割小米的時候，沒有去田裡工作的，要被責罵。
#e When people crop the millets,those who don’t go to the field to work will be scolded.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c Pani喜歡我跑過的操場。
#e Pani likes the playground that I ran in.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c Pani喜歡跑步過的人。
#e Pani likes the person who ran.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c Pani不知道你所哭的(原因)。
#e Pani doesn't know the reason you cried.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c Pani不知道Uva哭的原因。
#e Pani doesn’t know the reason Uva cries for.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 你給過我雞。
#e You gave me the chicken.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c Pani 喜歡那個給我雞的人。
#e Pani likes the person that gave me the chichen.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c Pani知道你要種小米。
#e Pani knows you are going to plant millets.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c Pani不知道你將要難過。
#e Pani doesn’t know you are going to feel sad.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c Pani不知道你所難過的(原因)。
#e Pani doesn’t know what you feel sad for.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c Pani不知道那個要難過的人是誰。
#e Pani doesn’t know the person who is going to feel sad.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c Pani知道你要坐。
#e Pani knows you are going to sit.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c Pani 喜歡那個你要坐的（東西）。
#e Pani likes (the thing) that you are going to sit on.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c Pani喜歡那個將要坐下的人。
#e Pani likes the person who is going to sit down.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c Pani知道你坐了。
#e Pani knows you have sat down.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c Pani討厭你要養的雞。
#e Pani hates the chicken you are going to raise.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c Pani討厭那個你要養的(東西)。
#e Pani hates the thing you are going to raise.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c Pani討厭那個要養雞的人。
#e Pani hates the person who is going to raise chickens.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

gloss: 完成.受焦-使役-生長-關係詞=2SG.屬格
free: #c Pani討厭你所養的雞。
#e Pani hates the chicken you raised.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c Pani不知道你笑我。
#e Pani doesn’t know you laugh at me.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 如果今天是好天氣, 那麼昨天所說的就沒有料中。
#e If it is sunny today, then what was said yesterday was wrong.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 如果他沒有寫的話, 將會被老師責備。
#e If he didn’t write (the homework), he would be scolded by the teacher.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 他跌倒之後, 就不能走路了。
#e After he fell down, he could not walk.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 如果不是有我, 你怎麼會有今天?
#e If it were not me, how could you have today’s success?

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 如果不是我, 你絕對不會有今天。
#e If it were not me, you definitely wouldn't have today’s success.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 假如不是我幫你, 你怎麼會有今天?
#e If it were not me who helped you, how could you have today’s success?

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 如果我掃了地, 媽媽就不會罵我。
#e If I swept the floor, the mother would not scold me.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 如果我是女生, 你(就)會喜歡我嗎?
#e If I were a girl, would you like me?

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 如果我不是女生, 你還會喜歡我嗎?
#e If I weren’t a girl, would you still like me?

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 很多人正在欺負那個小孩。
#e Many people are bullying that child.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 很多貓的肚子餓了起來。
#e Many cats get hungry.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 他們練習了一遍又一遍, 才把這個舞蹈學會。
#e After practicing again and again, they learned the dance.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 天色亮了, 小孩們起床迎接日出。
#e The sky is turning bright, and children are awake to meet the sunrise.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 幫我開燈!
#e Turn the lights on (for me).

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c Pani的老婆隨意抓了豆子。
#e Pani’s wife grabbed some beans randomly.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 我釣了少許小小的魚。
#e I fished a few tiny fish.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 不知道我的女朋友會不會做家事。
#e I don’t know whether my girlfriend can do housework or not.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 天就要黑了，他們的狗還要出去玩耍。
#e It’s turning dark, (but) their dog still wants to go out and play.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 我還要一碗飯。
#e I want one more bowl of rice.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 你還在工作嗎？
#e Do you still work?

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 秋天一到，綠色的葉子就會變黃。
#e When the autumn comes, green leaves will turn yellow.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 我和妹妹走去深潭看夕陽。
#e My sister and I go to the river pool to see the sunset.
